recommendedApps.heading: Recommended Apps
recommendedApps.subHeading: Enhance your store with these top-rated apps

app1.content: Generate custom invoices, packing slips, and order printouts with ease. Email professional invoices and streamline order processing.

app2.content: Easy Retail Barcode Generator. Print retail barcode labels for products. UPC and GTIN supported.

app3.content: B2B App to show VAT inclusive and VAT exclusive prices together. Validate EU VAT ID using VIES.

app4.content: This app lets you create appealing product bundles, boosting AOV and revenue with Mix and Match.

column2.label: Body
column2.helpText: Starting of the number being generated

option1.label: Consecutive number
option1.helpText: Generate SKUs with sequential numbers like 1, 2, 3, 4, etc.

option2.label: Continue from last SKU generation
option2.helpText: Resume numbering from the last generated SKU in the previous batch.
option2.tooltipContent: Only accessible for users with paid plan

option3.label: Disable body number
option3.helpText: SKUs will not include a numeric component in the body.

option4.label: Use product ID as number
option4.helpText: Incorporate the product's unique identifier into the SKU.

option5.label: Use variant ID as number
option5.helpText: Use the variant's unique identifier for products with multiple options.

option6.label: Use random number
option6.helpText: Generate a random number for each SKU.

layout.heading: Set SKU Layout :
layout.helpText: Drag and drop to rearrange components as you wish

separator.heading: Separator
separator.label: Value
separator.helpText: The value that will inserted between prefix, body and suffix

conditionConfiguration.heading: If-Then Configuration
conditionConfiguration.content: Set conditions based on product attributes and specify the actions to be taken when these conditions are met.
conditionConfiguration.tooltipContent: Eg: If you want to add "NK" to the SKU for a product titled "Nike Hoodie," enter "Nike Hoodie" in the "Match with" field and "NK" in the "Value to add" field. This will automatically append "NK" to the SKU whenever the product title matches "Nike Hoodie."

column1.label: Product Field
column1.helpText: Select the field to apply the condition on.

column2.label: Match with
column2.helpText: Enter the value that the selected field should match.

column3.label: Value to add
column3.helpText: Enter the value to add when the condition is met.

modal.heading: Upgrade Plan
modal.content: Upgrade plan to 'Pro Monthly' to access this feature.

label2.heading: Other options :
label2.option1: Apply only to products with empty SKUs

processing.heading: Adding data to Queue...
processing.content: Product data is currently being added to the job queue for SKU generation. Please wait while we process your data...

error.heading: Failed!
error.content: Error in generating SKU, Please try again

success.heading: Great!
success.content: Product data has been added to the SKU generation queue. The process will start shortly. Track the progress on the progress page.

helpUrl.line3: to report problems. Our support team will promptly assist you

AutomatedSku.heading: Configuration for API based SKU generation

automatedSKU.heading: Automated SKU
automatedSKU.subHeading: Enable automatic SKU creation for new products
automatedSKU.content: Once you subscribe to this feature, you can create multiple SKU preferences. When you create a new product, SKUs will be automatically generated and saved based on your preferences.
automatedSKU.label: To get started

list.second: Enable Automated SKU using the toggle above
list.third: SKUs will be effortlessly created for newly added products

modal.heading: Delete this SKU preference?
modal.content: Do you really want to delete this record? This process cannot be undone.

duplicateChecker.heading: About the Duplicate Checker
duplicateChecker.content1: The SKU Duplicate Checker scans your entire inventory for products with duplicate SKUs. This process may take several minutes depending on the size of your inventory.
duplicateChecker.content2: Use this tool regularly to ensure the integrity of your inventory management system.

empty.heading: No Duplicate Found
empty.content: Don't worry! There are no duplicate SKUs in your products. All SKUs are unique. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact support.

ProgressOrHistory.heading: SKU Generation Progress
ProgressOrHistory.subHeading: Tracking the current status of your SKU generation jobs
ProgressOrHistory.content: Below is the detailed progress of the ongoing SKU generation processes:

limitedBackupBanner.heading: Limited Time to Revert SKUs
limitedBackupBanner.content: Please note: You can only revert to the most recent SKUs. After 5 days, this data will be permanently removed and you will no longer be able to restore previous SKUs.

empty.heading: No Jobs Available
empty.content: It looks like there are no jobs to display at the moment. Please check back later or contact support if you think this is an error.

oldVsNewSku.heading: SKU History: Old vs New
oldVsNewSku.subHeading: Compare previous and updated SKUs for product variants

empty.heading: No History Found
empty.content: It looks like there are no history to display at the moment. Please check back later or contact support if you think this is an error.

getFreeCreditsBanner.heading: Earn 50 Free Credits
getFreeCreditsBanner.content: Write a review and get 50 credits as a free bonus! We value your feedback. Share your thoughts and enjoy 50 credits as our thank you!

lowCreditBanner.heading: Low Credits Warning
lowCreditBanner.content: Your remaining credits are running low. Consider topping up soon to avoid service interruption.
